#summary building NHD2 for mipsel based STB in openpli2.0.

cd to you openpli2.0 dir than:

= checkout makefile =
svn checkout http://neutrinohd2.googlecode.com/svn/trunk neutrino-mipsel

= =
cd neutrino-mipsel

= =
rename or copy Makefile.example to Makefile
== ==
= to build neutrino =
make neutrino

= to update neutrino Source Code =
make neutrino-update

= to clean neutrino build =
make neutrino-clean

= to distclean neutrino build =
make neutrino-distclean
